content: Combat sport events in 2021 ***ONE: Winter Warriors II*** (also known as ***ONE 149: Philippines vs. the World***) was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on December 3, 2021 and aired on December 17, 2021, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background The event was headlined by a flyweight bout between former [ONE Flyweight World Champion](/wiki/ONE_Flyweight_World_Champion) [Kairat Akhmetov](/wiki/Kairat_Akhmetov) and [Danny Kingad](/wiki/Danny_Kingad). A bantamweight bout between [Kwon Won Il](/wiki/Kwon_Won_Il) and former [ONE Bantamweight Champion](/wiki/ONE_Bantamweight_Champion) [Kevin Belingon](/wiki/Kevin_Belingon) served as the co-main event. Former [ONE Middleweight World Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Middleweight_World_Championship) [Vitaly Bigdash](/wiki/Vitaly_Bigdash) and [Fan Rong](/wiki/Fan_Rong) took place at a catchweight of 209 pounds. ## Results Main Card (YouTube/ONE Super App)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesFlyweight[Kairat Akhmetov](/wiki/Kairat_Akhmetov)def.[Danny Kingad](/wiki/Danny_Kingad)Decision (unanimous)35:00Bantamweight[Kwon Won Il](/wiki/Kwon_Won_Il)def.[Kevin Belingon](/wiki/Kevin_Belingon)KO (punch to the body)20:52Catchweight (209 lbs)[Vitaly Bigdash](/wiki/Vitaly_Bigdash)def.[Fan Rong](/wiki/Fan_Rong)Submission (guillotine choke)30:41WelterweightMurad Ramazanovdef.Zebaztian KadestamDecision (unanimous)35:00Bantamweight[Stephen Loman](/wiki/Stephen_Loman)def.Yusup SaadulaevTKO (punches)14:09BantamweightJhanlo Mark Sangiaodef.Paul LumihiSubmission (rear-naked choke)11:41Lead Card (Facebook/YouTube/ONE Super App)Lightweight Kickboxing[Arian Sadiković](/wiki/Arian_Sadikovi%C4%87)def.[Mustapha Haida](/wiki/Mustapha_Haida)Decision (unanimous)33:00Bantamweight[Fabrício Andrade](/wiki/Fabr%C3%ADcio_Andrade)def.Li Kai WenTKO (punches)14:41Catchweight (127.5 lbs) Muay Thai[Joseph Lasiri](/wiki/Joseph_Lasiri)def.[Asahi Shinagawa](/wiki/Asahi_Shinagawa)KO (punch and knee)12:05[a] - Martial Arts portal - [2021 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2021_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE: Winter Warriors II
